E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/9/1977
Subject: Progress of Tom Tellmann
Dear Sir,
Tom Tellmann has nothing more to prove at A Lynchburg Mets!
He has an ERA of 1.07 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 6/11/1977
Subject: Dick Green injured
Hello Manager,
he had a little fight in a bar, and got knocked out.
Diagnosis: Knocked Out Teeth.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 4 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
